titles: Moon-shine, or, The restauration of jews-trumps and bagpipes being an answer to Dr. R. Wild's Letter &c. and his Poetica licentia, &c.
author: Achard, J.
notes: Attributed to J. Achard. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
keywords: Wild, Robert, 1609-1679. --  Letter from Dr. R.W. to his friend Mr. J.J. upon occasion of His Majesty's declaration for liberty of conscience.
